long_description: Made of soft thermal polyester, the REI Midweight Quarter-Zip top offers active girls an ideal base layer for skiing, snowboarding and other outdoor fun in cold weather. Polyester fabric draws moisture away from the skin to help keep her dry during aerobic activity; a touch of spandex ensures stretch and shape retention. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Soft peached finish, zipper guard and flat seams provide all-day comfort; mock turtleneck adds warmth.
short_description: Made of soft thermal polyester, the REI Midweight Quarter-Zip top offers active girls an ideal base layer for skiing, snowboarding and other outdoor fun in cold weather.
